mods.abstract: The California Magazine of Western Square and Round Dancing by the Square Dancers of Southern California. This edition includes a table of contents which lists the following: SQUARE DANCES "I'll Always Thank You for the Sunshine", "Time Payment", "Kool", and "Wheelbarrow Square". ROUND DANCES "Cinderella Waltz", and "You Can't Get Lovin'". SPECIAL FEATURES "Let's View the Future", ""Denver is Fine in '59"", "The Program of the Century", "What Made A Club Tick?", "At the Brussels World's Fair", "Square Dancing Dateline Europe", "Caller Round-Up", and "Three Firsts for MacDill". This edition also includes the the regular features entitled "Square Dance Date Book", "From the Floor", "As I See It", "Chuck Jones' Note Book", "Style Series: Band the Line", "Style Series: Having To Do With Body Mechanism and the Basic Two-Step", "Square of the Month: Lynn Woodward", "Square Dance Picture", "Ladies on the Square: The Men Have Their Innings", "Round the Outside Ring", "On the Record", and "Paging the Roundancers: Joe and Es Turner".
mods.accessCondition: Copyright restrictions may apply. User is responsible for all copyright compliance.
